numeric.name: loopback_enable
numeric.doc: Use loopback in the adapter server instead of go through the pipe when receiving tx packets

numeric.name: packet_header_signal_id
numeric.doc: The adater signal id to identify the packet header

numeric.name: constant_header_size
numeric.doc: Number of bytes in the constant header of a rx packet

numeric.name: do_collect_enable
numeric.doc: Use do_collect in adapter in order to collect writes into one bulk write.
